ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c , "Simply Retirement" )) && Connected_Partner__c != "Sallus" && ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Stage__c, "Funding") && ISCHANGED(Implementation_Stage__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Update_Verify_Plan_Provisions__c , "Yes")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Service_Option__c, "Single(k) Plus"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure Update & Verify Plan Provisions is set to "Yes"
